title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 29 April 2008 - XWiki
content:
ludobot - (29/04/2008 12:47): SaiKrishna: not sure we package this.. you should use svn to get the code  
SaiKrishna - (29/04/2008 12:48): oh! I have tried SVN, but there seems to be a problem in our institute network administration :(  
SaiKrishna - (29/04/2008 12:48): I am not able to download it with SVN   
SaiKrishna - (29/04/2008 12:50): Is there any other way to get the source code ? If not I should try with alternative network  
jvelociter - (29/04/2008 13:01): vmassol: upgrading myxwiki.org to latest 1.4  
jvelociter - (29/04/2008 13:22): we still have the issue with sections edits  
jvelociter - (29/04/2008 13:22): did we create a jira for it ?  
vmassol - (29/04/2008 13:28): jvelociter: great thanks  
vmassol - (29/04/2008 13:28): hmm... I think so let me get it  
jvelociter - (29/04/2008 13:28): vmassol: just finished  
vmassol - (29/04/2008 13:29): http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-2342  
vmassol - (29/04/2008 13:29): jvelociter: ok I'll announce the farm now on the list  
vmassol - (29/04/2008 13:29): ta  
jvelociter - (29/04/2008 13:29): cool  
jvelociter - (29/04/2008 13:29): I'll announce my blog on it then :)  
jvelociter - (29/04/2008 14:14): vmassol: will you write a blog post for myxwiki.org on xwiki.org ?  
vmassol - (29/04/2008 14:15): jvelociter: go ahead if you want  
jvelociter - (29/04/2008 14:15): ok  
xwikibot - (29/04/2008 17:51): XWiki.SebastienSauteur was modified by XWiki.SebastienSauteur (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/SebastienSauteur  
xwikibot - (29/04/2008 18:17): Drafts.DebugXEWithEclipse was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne (Added comment) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/DebugXEWithEclipse  
xwikibot - (29/04/2008 18:18): Drafts.DebugXEWithEclipse was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/DebugXEWithEclipse  
xwikibot - (29/04/2008 18:18): Drafts.DebugXEWithEclipse was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/DebugXEWithEclipse  
xwikibot - (29/04/2008 18:19): Drafts.DebugXEWithEclipse was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/DebugXEWithEclipse  
xwikibot - (29/04/2008 18:48): XWiki.elemeur was modified by XWiki.elemeur (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/elemeur  
xwikibot - (29/04/2008 19:55): Drafts.DebugXEWithEclipse\_MirrorWeb was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (removed leftover) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/DebugXEWithEclipse\_MirrorWeb  
xwikibot - (29/04/2008 20:07): XWiki.rnreekez was modified by XWiki.rnreekez (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/rnreekez  
ldubost - (29/04/2008 21:30): Am I right and myxwiki.org wikis are created with open acces to guest ? If so we need to change this because this is going to make it prone to spam  
ldubost - (29/04/2008 21:30): and to heavy search engine load  
ldubost - (29/04/2008 21:30): we should default to private and people wanting it open can open it  
vmassol - (29/04/2008 22:06): ldubost: the template I have generates private wikis  
vmassol - (29/04/2008 22:06): why do you say this?  
vmassol - (29/04/2008 22:06): see template.myxwiki.org  
vmassol - (29/04/2008 22:06): for the default rights  
ldubost - (29/04/2008 22:22): ok great  
ldubost - (29/04/2008 22:22): my understand was based on wikis created from a xar.. but it moved to a template  
ldubost - (29/04/2008 22:22): so things are cool
